body:
### Problem

The newly released nightly package for macOS(x86-64) automatically exits just a few seconds after opening. The terminal I use is kitty.
[macOS package](https://github.com/neovim/neovim/releases/download/nightly/nvim-macos.tar.gz)
![image](https://github.com/neovim/neovim/assets/44560513/db1f6da1-5028-44a9-8058-0d400f577ba6)


### Steps to reproduce

0. Download and use nightly package.
1. `vim .`
2. Just wait a few seconds.

### Expected behavior

Open my project normally as before without exiting.

### Neovim version (nvim -v)

nightly build ( c52dfb6 )

### Vim (not Nvim) behaves the same?

no

### Operating system/version

macOS 14.2.1

### Terminal name/version

kitty

### $TERM environment variable

xterm-kitty

### Installation

download from nightly build package.

It's likely that your [nvim-ufo](https://github.com/kevinhwang91/nvim-ufo) version is outdated. You need to update its version to after this commit: https://github.com/kevinhwang91/nvim-ufo/commit/e29dbf5b2d76ea43f4e585e3deeb6510488eee3f.
Thank you very much, it's working now!

title: The newly released nightly package for macOS(x86-64) automatically exits just a few seconds after opening.
